Package mmj.pa

Class FooterStmt

java.lang.Object
mmj.pa.ProofWorkStmt
mmj.pa.FooterStmt
public class FooterStmt extends ProofWorkStmt
FooterStmt is simply the "$)" in column 1 of the last line of a proof.

Note: the purpose of FooterStmt is to provide a terminator so that multiple proofs can be stored in a file (and this is done for batch volume testing.)

    • load

      public String load(String firstToken) throws IOException, MMIOException, ProofAsstException
      Load Footer statement with Tokenizer input

      Output/Updates

      • accum tokens and whitespace into stmtText, checking for extra tokens or premature EOF
      • throw exception if structural error found.
      • set status to 0 if no errors
      • return nextToken after trailing whitespace. the start of the next statement.
      • keep track of lineCnt, number of lines in the statement.
      • position cursor to field in error, as needed.
      • Load Footer statement fields.
      Overrides:
      load in class ProofWorkStmt
      Parameters:
      firstToken - first token of the statement
      Returns:
      first token of the next statement.
      Throws:
      IOException - if IO error
      MMIOException - if an error occurred
      ProofAsstException - if an error occurred
